summary: Added directoryNotFound flag to API response when directory does not exist
Added createDirectory flag to API to auto-create missing directories
Added confirmation modal in /config page to offer directory creation
User can now choose to create missing directory when adding new project
reviewFocus: Verify modal appears when directory does not exist
